name: Dwarf
description: Stout folk renowned for resilience, craftsmanship, and deep tradition.

name: Elf
description: Graceful wanderers attuned to magic and the ancient woods.

name: Halfling
description: Cheerful travelers who rely on luck and nimble reflexes.

name: Human
description: Versatile and ambitious people found in every land.

name: Dragonborn
description: Descendants of dragons who wield a breath weapon and proud heritage.

name: Gnome
description: Inventive tinkerers whose curiosity drives them to explore.

name: Half-Elf
description: Children of two worlds who blend adaptability with fey grace.

name: Half-Orc
description: Fierce combatants whose courage and endurance shine in battle.

name: Tiefling
description: People touched by infernal blood who command innate arcane gifts.
